purpleculture_pinyin:
suān
variant of 酸 ; to ache; to be sore
вариант кислоты; болеть; болеть
humanum_full_description_en:
From "疒" to "夋" sound. The original meaning is slight pain and weakness caused by fatigue or disease, also called " acid ". "Guang Ya. Interpretation 2": "Sorrow, pain." Wang Niansun Shuzheng: "Today's proverb is still sore." Such as "Su Wen. "Tabbing malaria": "For those who have a sore foot and shin, first puncture the feet of Yangming and ten fingers for free bleeding." Chapter 21 of "Awakening Marriage" by Xi Zhousheng of the Qing Dynasty: "Until the night of December 15th, I felt waist pain When I got up, Madam Chao never slept."

" Sour " is also the name of the stone. "Word Supplement. Furuncle: "Sour, stone name." Such as "Shan Hai Jing. "Zhongshan Jing": "Fifty miles to the southeast, it is said that the mountain of Fengbo is rich in gold and jade, and underneath it is more acid stone, aragonite, and iron, and its wood is more lily and sandalwood."
humanum_short_description_en: From "疒" to "夋" sound. The original meaning is slight pain and weakness caused by fatigue or disease, also called " acid ".
humanum_full_description:
從「疒」，「夋」聲。本義是因疲勞或疾病引起的微痛和無力感，亦作「酸」。《廣雅．釋詁二》：「痠，痛也。」王念孫疏證：「今俗語猶云酸痛矣。」如《素問．刺瘧》：「先足脛痠痛者，先刺足陽明十指閒出血。」清代西周生《醒世姻緣》第21回：「直到了十二月十五的晚間，方覺得腰痠肚痛起來，晁夫人也就不曾睡。」

　　「痠」也是石名。《字彙補．疒部》：「痠，石名。」如《山海經．中山經》：「又東南五十里，曰風伯之山，其上多金玉，其下多痠石、文石，多鐵，其木多柳杻檀楮。」
humanum_short_description: 從「疒」，「夋」聲。本義是因疲勞或疾病引起的微痛和無力感，亦作「酸」。

HSK 4: 酸
從「 疒 」，「 夋 」聲。本義是因疲勞或疾病引起的微痛和無力感，亦作「 酸 」。《廣雅．釋詁二》：「痠，痛也。」王念孫疏證：「今俗語猶云酸痛矣。」如《素問．刺瘧》：「先足脛痠痛者，先刺足陽明十指閒出血。」清代西周生《醒世姻緣》第21回：「直到了十二月十五的晚間，方覺得腰痠肚痛起來，晁夫人也就不曾睡。」 「 痠 」也是石名。《字彙補．疒部》：「痠，石名。」如《山海經．中山經》：「又東南五十里，曰風伯之山，其上多金玉，其下多痠石、文石，多鐵，其木多柳杻檀楮。」
From " 疒" to " 夋" sound. The original meaning is slight pain and weakness caused by fatigue or disease, also called " acid". "Guang Ya. Interpretation 2": "Sorrow, pain." Wang Niansun Shuzheng: "Today's proverb is still sore." Such as "Su Wen. "Tabbing malaria": "For those who have a sore foot and shin, first puncture the feet of Yangming and ten fingers for free bleeding." Chapter 21 of "Awakening Marriage" by Xi Zhousheng of the Qing Dynasty: "Until the night of December 15th, I felt waist pain When I got up, Madam Chao never slept." " Sour" is also the name of the stone. "Word Supplement. Furuncle: "Sour, stone name." Such as "Shan Hai Jing. "Zhongshan Jing": "Fifty miles to the southeast, it is said that the mountain of Fengbo is rich in gold and jade, and underneath it is more acid stone, aragonite, and iron, and its wood is more lily and sandalwood."

痠字的基本解释

痠
suān
同“酸”⑤。

痠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suān］
［《廣韻》素官切，平桓，心。］
(1)人身肌肉过度疲劳或因病引起的酸痛无力的感觉。
(2)石名。

痠字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痠； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页774第07
【廣韻】素官切【集韻】蘇官切，?音酸。痠疼。【博雅】痠，痛也。　又石名。【山海經】風伯之山，多痠石。

痠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
痠字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suān］
["Guangyun" Suguan cut, Pinghuan, heart. ]
(1) Excessive muscle fatigue or soreness and weakness caused by illness.
(2) The name of the stone.
acid
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Sorry Character Department] 　acid; Kangxi strokes: 12; page number: page 774 to 07
[Guang Yun] Su Guan cut [Ji Yun] Su Guan cut, with sour tone. Sore. [Bo Ya] Sore and painful.　Also stone name. 【Shanhaijing】The mountain of Fengbo is rich in acid stones.
